cbb

cbb

Source:
  • cbb.service.js, line 3

Operations for Men's College Basketball.

Methods

(async, static) getBoxScore(id)

Source:
  • cbb.service.js, line 51

Gets the Men's College Basketball game box score data for a specified game.

Example
const result = await sdv.cbb.getBoxScore(401260281);
Parameters:
Name Type Description
id number

Game id.
Returns:

json

(async, static) getPlayerRankings(year, page, group)

Source:
  • cbb.service.js, line 179

Gets the Men's College Basketball Player recruiting data for a specified year, page, position and institution type if available.

Example
const result = await sdv.cbb.getPlayerRankings({year: 2016});
Parameters:
Name Type Description
year *

Year (YYYY)
page number

Page (50 per page)
group "HighSchool" | "JuniorCollege" | "PrepSchool"

Institution Type
Returns:

json

(async, static) getSchedule(year, month, day, group, seasontype)

Source:
  • cbb.service.js, line 322

Gets the Men's College Basketball schedule data for a specified date if available.

Example
const result = await sdv.cbb.getSchedule(
year = 2021, month = 02, day = 15, group=50
)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
year *

Year (YYYY)
month *

Month (MM)
day *

Day (DD)
group number

Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III
seasontype number

Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4
Returns:

json

(async, static) getScoreboard(year, month, day, group, seasontype, limit)

Source:
  • cbb.service.js, line 358

Gets the Men's College Basketball scoreboard data for a specified date if available.

Example
const result = await sdv.cbb.getScoreboard(
year = 2021, month = 02, day = 15, group=50
)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
year *

Year (YYYY)
month *

Month (MM)
day *

Day (DD)
group number

Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III
seasontype number

Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4
limit number

Limit on the number of results @default 300
Returns:

json
